comment.author: George
comment.text: Fox News is there anybody manning the studio???? The most chaotic Coverage of a Convention in my lifetime!!! Are you frigging kidding me??!!!!! The Rudest Commentating, meaning you all spoke while the speakers were speaking, it was a bunch of garble!!! We could not understand crap!!! I gotta find another News Stations!!!

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Me To!!! The Comentating Went On And On And Was Loud.!!!!

replies.author: Gabrielle
replies.text: They were obviously not wanting to let us hear the speakers! I was beyond angry at them!!! I bet they don't do that for the Democrat convention! SO RUDE!!!!

replies.author: David
replies.text: There was a separate fox feed that had no speakers and just played the delegates audio.

replies.author: Alyssa
replies.text: I was pissed also I kept yelling at the tv shut up people I want to hear what they votes are and when it came to Pennsylvania final reveal they went to commercial I screamed and haven't heard the results yet
